title: Acquisition of the Eurosport group by Discovery Communications | Groupe TF1 : actualités, communiqués, agenda, événements, publications
snippet: Acquisition of the Eurosport group by Discovery Communications The TF1 group and Discovery Communications today confirm completion of: the acquisition by Discovery Communications of a 49% equity interest in the Eurosport group, which is now 100% owned by Discovery Communications; the buyout ...

title: Acquistion of Eurosport France by Eurosport SAS | Groupe TF1 : actualités, communiqués, agenda, événements, publications
snippet: Boulogne-Billancourt, March 31, ... France. The share capital of Eurosport group (including Eurosport France) is now 51% owned by Discovery Communications and 49% owned by TF1 group....

title: Eurosport - Wikipedia
snippet: On 21 December 2012, Discovery Communications purchased a 20 per cent minority interest share in Eurosport from TF1 Group for €170m. Discovery became the majority shareholder in the Eurosport venture with TF1 in January 2014, taking a 51% share of the company.

title: Warner Bros. Discovery - Discovery Communications To Acquire TF1 Group's Controlling Interest In Top Sports Platform Eurosport
snippet: - Transaction Will Create Leading Portfolio of Pay-TV Networks across Europe - Discovery Communications and TF1 Group today announced Discovery would acquire a controlling interest in Eurosport International through an extension of their larger strategic partnership first announced in December 2012

title: DISCOVERY COMMUNICATIONS TO ACQUIRE TF… : Discovery Communications
snippet: (Silver Spring, Maryland and Paris, France) Discovery Communications and TF1 Group today announced Discovery would acquire a controlling interest in Eurosport International through an extension of their larger strategic partnership first announced in December 2012.
